traits.name: False Object
entries: If the library is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the library move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the library is animate.

actions.name: Chained Book
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12).
